Transform Citation Keys in a Data Frame Column

ngr_cite_keys_table_col.Rd

This function applies the ngr_cite_keys_to_inline transformation to a specified column in a data frame. It validates the inputs, checks that the specified column exists in the data frame, and replaces its contents with the transformed values.

Usage

ngr_cite_keys_table_col(
  dat = NULL,
  col_format = NULL,
  bib_file = "references.bib"
)

Arguments

dat

A data frame containing the column to transform.

col_format

A string specifying the name of the column to transform.

bib_file

A file path to the bibliography file (.bib) used for citation keys. Defaults to "references.bib" in the current working directory.

Value

A data frame with the specified column transformed.

See also

Other cite: ngr_cite_assemble(), ngr_cite_format(), ngr_cite_format_single(), ngr_cite_keys_to_xref()

Examples

# Example data frame
df <- data.frame(
  id = 1:3,
  bib_keys = c("key1", "key2", "key3")
)

# Apply the transformation
result <- ngr_cite_keys_table_col(df, col_format = "bib_keys")
#> Error in ngr_cite_keys_to_inline(x, bib_file = bib_file): The specified bibliography file does not exist: references.bib
